wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Roberts (2 September 1900 – 9 March 1984) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside forward in the Football League for Watford, Queens Park Rangers, Halifax Town, Southport, Clapton Orient, Luton Town, Barrow and Cardiff City, in non-League football for Oswestry Town, York City, Dartford and Worcester City and was on the books of Millwall without making a league appearance.
